item.description:
Lets meetup at Common Grounds. They have some good selections of beers on tap, my favorite is the Maudite. Here's a list of all the beers on tap:
Dogfish Head 60 Minute I.P.A.
Victory Prima Pils
Smuttynose I.P.A.
Arrogant Bastard Ale
Franziskaner Dunkel-Weiss
Sam Adams Winter Lager
Guinness Stout
Newcastle Brown Ale
Stella Artois Lager
Hoegaarden Belgian White
Harpoon I.P.A.
Sam Adams Lager
Maudite
Sierra Nevada Pale Ale
Rogue “Dead Guy” Ale
Miller Lite
Miller High Life
They also have bottled beer and food, the menu is on the website http://www.commongrou... Afterwards we may stay there for 90's night or venture out for other Allston nightlife.
item.how_to_find_us: By text message, I'll send my phone number to Yes RSVPs
item.name: Common Ground in Allston
